title: Output Schema for createFunction Operation
description: Output schema for the createFunction operation in the connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the createFunction operation.

Runtime.description: The identifier of the function's runtime.

Handler.description: The function that Lambda calls to begin executing your function.

CodeSize.description: The size of the function's deployment package, in bytes.

Timeout.description: The amount of time in seconds that Lambda allows a function to run before stopping it.

MemorySize.description: The amount of memory available to the function at runtime.

LastModified.description: The date and time that the function was last updated.

CodeSha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the function's deployment package.

Version.description: The version of the Lambda function.

RevisionId.description: A unique identifier that changes when you update the function's configuration.

State.description: The current state of the function.

StateReason.description: The reason for the function's current state.

StateReasonCode.description: The reason code for the function's current state.

LastUpdateStatus.description: The status of the last update that was performed on the function.

LastUpdateStatusReason.description: The reason for the last update that was performed on the function.

LastUpdateStatusReasonCode.description: The reason code for the last update that was performed on the function.

TracingConfig.description: The function's AWS X-Ray tracing configuration.

KMSKeyArn.description: The KMS key that's used to encrypt the function's environment variables.

MasterArn.description: For Lambda@Edge functions, the ARN of the main function.

FileSystemConfigs.description: Connection settings for an Amazon EFS file system.

SigningJobArn.description: The ARN of the signing job.

SigningProfileVersionArn.description: The ARN of the signing profile version.

Architectures.description: The instruction set architecture that the function supports.

EphemeralStorage.description: The size of the function's /tmp directory in MB.

Size.description: The size of the function's /tmp directory.

SnapStart.description: Set ApplyOn to PublishedVersions to create a snapshot of the initialized execution environment when you publish a function version.

RuntimeVersionConfig.description: The ARN of the runtime and any errors that occured.

RuntimeVersionArn.description: The ARN of the runtime version.

ApplicationLogLevel.description: Set this property to filter the application logs for your function that Lambda sends to CloudWatch.

SystemLogLevel.description: Set this property to filter the system logs for your function that Lambda sends to CloudWatch.

LogGroup.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group the function sends logs to.

headers.description: Transport headers returned by the createFunction operation.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.
